des: "This recipe has been handed down through generations of German families in northern Idaho. Everyone around here makes it. It's good served either warm or cold."
ins: In a large bowl, combine cabbage and onions. In a saucepan, mix sugar, vinegar, celery seed and salt; bring to a boil. Add oil; return to boiling and cook until sugar dissolves. Pour over cabbage; toss gently. Chill.
